snippet: The Environmental Protection Agency has approved a new version of a popular weed killer to be used on genetically modified corn and soybeans.
abstract: Environmental Protection Agency has approved new version of Enlist Duo, popular weed killer, to be used on genetically modified corn and soybeans.
lead_paragraph: The Environmental Protection Agency has approved a new version of a popular weed killer to be used on genetically modified corn and soybeans.

headline.main: E.P.A. Accepts New Version of Weed Killer for Farming Use
headline.print_headline: E.P.A. Accepts New Version of Weed Killer for Farming Use
